price: a Book whose verses are well explained; an Arabic Qur’an[2] for people who understand,
arabic: كِتَٰبٞ فُصِّلَتۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [2] i.e., revealed in the Arabic language.
